text: Emperor's Cup is a Japanese football competition. It is one of the three major titles in Japan, along with J. League Division 1 and J.League Cup. ==Champions== Season Champions Runner-up 2001 Shimizu S-Pulse Cerezo Osaka 2002 Kyoto Purple Sanga Kashima Antlers 2003 Júbilo Iwata Cerezo Osaka 2004 Tokyo Verdy Júbilo Iwata 2005 Urawa Red Diamonds Shimizu S-Pulse 2006 Urawa Red Diamonds Gamba Osaka 2007 Kashima Antlers Sanfrecce Hiroshima 2008 Gamba Osaka Kashiwa Reysol 2009 Gamba Osaka Nagoya Grampus 2010 Kashima Antlers Shimizu S-Pulse 2011 F.C. Tokyo Kyoto Sanga F.C. 2012 Kashiwa Reysol Gamba Osaka 2013 Yokohama F. Marinos Sanfrecce Hiroshima 2014 Gamba Osaka Montedio Yamagata 2015 Gamba Osaka Urawa Red Diamonds ===Former champions=== ==References== Category:Football in Japan Category:Football competitions in Japan
title: Emperor's Cup
